machine_end_gcode.default_value:
; move printhead away from object
G1 Z22.000 ; for object exclusion
G1 E-.76675 F2400
; fan off
M106 S0
M106 P2 S0
;TYPE:Custom
; filament end gcode
G92 E0
G1 E-2 F3000
G1 Z24 F900 ; Move print head further up 
G1 F12000; present print
G1 X44;  throw_position_x
G1 Y270; throw_position_y
M140 S0 ; turn off heatbed
M104 S0 ; turn off temperature
M106 P1 S0 ; turn off fan
M106 P2 S0
M106 P3 S0
M84; disable motors                  
; disable stepper motors
M106 P3 S204

; CONFIG FOR SCREEN PRINT PREVIEW
; total filament used [g] = {filament_weight}

; CONFIG_BLOCK_START = begin
; filament_type = {material_type}
; nozzle_temperature = {material_print_temperature}
; bed_temperature = {material_bed_temperature}
; CONFIG_BLOCK_END = end

machine_start_gcode.default_value:
M106 S0
M106 P2 S0
;TYPE:Custom
G9111 bedTemp={material_bed_temperature} extruderTemp={material_print_temperature}
M117
M106 P3 S153
G90
G21
M83 ; use relative distances for extrusion
; filament start gcode
M900 K0.035 ; Override pressure advance value
M106 S0
M106 P2 S0

M420 S1 ;load stored mesh to avoid auto-leveling
